Class ItemDeck

extends Deck
    Class that represent the Item Deck of the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemDeck()
      Constructor that initialize the deck filling it with the specified amount of any card

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card drawCard()
      Remove the top card from the deck, WITHOUT adding it to the discard pile (cards drawn here end up in the personal decks of the players).

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        Remove the top card from the deck, WITHOUT adding it to the discard pile (cards drawn here end up in the personal decks of the players).

        If there are no cards in the deck, gets all the cards in the discards pile, adds them to the deck, shuffles the deck, and finally draws the first card

        Overrides:
        drawCard in class Deck
        Returns:
        the card drawn
